resources.string:
Hi, we deal in comics business. 

We are located on 221B Baker Street, Sunnyvale View, California. 

We are opened from Mon to Sun 10:00 am to 7:00 pm. 

You can contact us on +1 440 243 5412 or visit us on marvdccomics.com 

You can also email us on info@marvdccomics.com. 
We have comic books dealing with characters such as wonder widow, captain flash, Hawk man, Aqua spider and Bat Thor. 
The famous movie series of Justice Avengers has been made on our comic books. 

We will be back soon with much more information about our upcoming plans. 

Stay tuned for comic con 2032 where we unveil Super Iron Man .
